00028 namespace cinder {
00029 using boost::int8_t;
00030 using boost::uint8_t;
00031 using boost::int16_t;
00032 using boost::uint16_t;
00033 using boost::int32_t;
00034 using boost::uint32_t;
00035 using boost::int64_t;
00036 using boost::uint64_t;
00037 
00038 using boost::shared_ptr;
00039 using boost::checked_array_deleter;
00040 
00041 #define CINDER_CINDER
00042 
00043 #if defined(_WIN32) || defined(__WIN32__) || defined(WIN32)
00044     #define CINDER_MSW
00045 #elif defined(linux) || defined(__linux) || defined(__linux__)
00046     #define CINDER_LINUX
00047 #elif defined(macintosh) || defined(__APPLE__) || defined(__APPLE_CC__)
00048     #define CINDER_COCOA
00049     #include "TargetConditionals.h"
00050     #if TARGET_OS_IPHONE
00051         #define CINDER_COCOA_TOUCH
00052     #else
00053         #define CINDER_MAC
00054     #endif
00055     // This is defined to prevent the inclusion of some unfortunate macros in <AssertMacros.h>
00056     #define __ASSERTMACROS__
00057 #else
00058     #error "cinder compile error: Unknown platform"
00059 #endif
00060 
00061 #define CINDER_LITTLE_ENDIAN
00062 
00063 } // namespace cinder
